model.name: rss
model.title: RSS
model.description: RSS data format is used for working with RSS sync feed Java Objects and transforming to XML and vice-versa.
model.label: dataformat,transformation

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format if the data format is capable of doing so. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSon etc.
